name: extended-fasttransfer
title: Extended Fast Transfer
author: jodokus31
description:
More Hotkeys to fast transfer items from entities to player and vice versa. 
f.e. top-up stacks of items in player's inventory, quickstack items into chest, drop more than one item into an entity, etc.
New: Add hotkey to add item requests to entities/ghosts to prime a machine with bots.
